snippet.textDisplay:
The stamina system in this game is broken. The developers need to fix it asap. Otherwise, many will quit this game. 

I am at the spider cave, i have defeated couple of bosses so far, so my critique is valid. This game punishes you for its own mistake "stamina system".
snippet.textOriginal:
The stamina system in this game is broken. The developers need to fix it asap. Otherwise, many will quit this game. 

I am at the spider cave, i have defeated couple of bosses so far, so my critique is valid. This game punishes you for its own mistake "stamina system".
